definitions: a flat or curved component, typically rectangular, that forms or is set into the surface of a door, wall, or ceiling.
a group of people gathered to conduct a discussion or, more commonly, to offer advice on a particular topic.
a distinct section of a comic strip or cartoon.
a subdivision of electronic or electrical equipment.
examples: The panel of experts discussed the new policy.
Install the solar panels on the roof.
Check the control panel for errors.
Read the first panel of the comic strip.
